snippet: Brokerages will have to report the details of a broker’s termination in three business days, down from 15.
abstract: Financial Industry Regulatory Authority rule requires brokerage firms, beginning Dec 12, to report details of broker's departure from a firm in three business days, down from 15.
lead_paragraph: Brokerages will have to report the details of a broker’s termination in three business days, down from 15.

headline.main: New Rules on Reporting Brokers’ Dismissals to Begin Dec. 12
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Finra Tightens Oversight of Broker Terminations
